docs.title: FS25 Interaction Design Methods
docs.text: Blog of Florian Kleiser, documenting the lessons and topics of the FS25 Interaction Design Methods class.

docs.title: Lesson 1
docs.text:
Note

i did not take any notes for the first lesson because Joëlle said we shouldnt have our laptops open during the lesson. I only realized later that this probably was a misunderstanding (?)

docs.title: Summary:
docs.text: The first lesson was an introduction to the course, going over the structure aswell as the assignment that we have to do in groups, where we are responsible for explaining one assigned topic from two different angles, and mediate a class lesson around the topic.

docs.title: Takeaways
docs.text: Many interesting names of designers and artists that i would love to research more, but sadly, i did not take any notes of their names because i thought we were not supposed to have our laptops open.
